channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Covers, Gratings & Frames problem, 19th August
item.description:
Road closure needed please 28 day please replace x1 broken missing gully frame an lid 550x400x60mm please note this is the permanent repair for make safe stats required (Broken Chamber Cover/Frame)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 19th August
item.description:
F/W depression patch - 400mm x 1800mm x 25mm - 0.72m2 - 28 days - F/W closure signage (FW6 Edge Deterioration)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 19th August
item.description:
F/W closure Cut back 2 large hedges encroaching onto footpath - ENWD - F/W closure (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -FW6 Potholes problem, 19th August
item.description:
2 hour with give an take make safe footway pothole 300x400x50mm (FW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 19th August
item.description:
Give and take plus temporary footway closure required 28 day please cut back overgrown tree growth from base of tree back to boundary approximately 2 metres x3 metres (Overgrown Tree)
Report on FixMyStreet
